Detailed Case Studies

In-depth analysis of our most successful partnerships and events, showcasing our strategic approach and measurable outcomes.

Education Technology

EdTech Innovation Summit 2023

Connecting education technology innovators with investors and policymakers to shape the future of learning across Africa.

3 Major Sponsors
500+ Attendees
100M Sponsorship Value
92% Satisfaction Rate
Key Outcomes:
  • Secured long-term partnerships with 2 major tech companies
  • Generated 45 qualified leads for future collaborations
  • Increased post-event engagement by 40% across platforms
  • Facilitated 3 pilot projects between startups and sponsors
Youth Empowerment

Youth Leadership Conference 2023

Empowering 300+ young leaders with skills, networks, and inspiration to drive positive change in their communities.

3 Strategic Partners
300+ Participants
15 Partnership Leads
85% Skill Improvement
Key Outcomes:
  • 15 participants secured internships with partner organizations
  • Launched 3 community projects funded by sponsors
  • Generated media coverage reaching 50,000+ people
  • Established ongoing mentorship program with partners
Technology & Innovation

Women in Tech Hackathon 2025

A 48-hour innovation challenge bringing together women developers to solve real-world problems with technology.

4 Sponsorship Deals
150+ Developers
12 Projects Developed
1 Incubated Project
Key Outcomes:
  • Winning project received 2M naira incubation support
  • 8 participants hired by sponsoring companies
  • Generated 25+ innovative solutions to social challenges
  • Increased sponsor brand visibility by 60% among target audience
Capacity Building

Digital Skills Workshop Series 2023

Quarterly workshop series training underserved youth in digital literacy, coding, and tech entrepreneurship.

1 Major Sponsor
200+ Youth Trained
95% Satisfaction Rate
40% Employment Rate
Key Outcomes:
  • 80+ participants secured tech-related employment within 3 months
  • Sponsor recognized with CSR award for initiative
  • Program expanded to 3 additional cities based on success
  • Generated positive media coverage worth 1M in equivalent advertising
Community Engagement

Community Impact Festival 2023

Annual festival bringing together local businesses, NGOs, and community members to drive social impact and economic growth.

5 Local Business Partners
1000+ Attendees
10M+ Funds Raised
12 Community Projects
Key Outcomes:
  • Raised $10,000+ for 3 local community projects
  • Increased foot traffic for partner businesses by 35%
  • Created 12 ongoing partnerships between businesses and NGOs
  • Generated economic impact of 100M+ in the local community

Client Testimonials

Hear directly from our partners and clients about their experiences working with Intelleva.

"Working with Intelleva transformed our approach to partnerships. Their strategic insight helped us secure three major sponsors for our EdTech summit, resulting in 40% higher engagement than previous years. The team's attention to detail and commitment to our mission was exceptional."

David Johnson

CEO, EdTech Innovations Africa

"The Youth Leadership Conference organized by Intelleva exceeded all our expectations. Not only did they secure perfect partners aligned with our values, but their operational excellence ensured a seamless experience for 300+ participants. The 15 partnership leads generated have already resulted in two ongoing collaborations."

Sarah Williams

Director, Youth Empowerment Initiative

"As a sponsor for the Women in Tech Hackathon, we were impressed with Intelleva's ability to connect us with exactly the right audience. The event resulted in us hiring 8 talented developers and provided exceptional brand visibility. Their commission-based model ensured everyone was invested in success."

Michael Chen

CTO, TechSolutions Inc.

"Intelleva's partnership approach is both strategic and flexible. Their 5% commission model aligned perfectly with our funding realities while ensuring they were motivated to deliver results. The Digital Skills Workshop series they coordinated for us has become a flagship CSR program recognized with an industry award."

Amina Okeke

CSR Manager, GlobalTech Nigeria
